title: Man Utd Women sign Jess Park from Man City | 4 September 2025
body_text:
Transfer news: United Women sign Jess Park
Jess Park has signed for Manchester United on a contract until June 2029.
The attacking midfielder has joined from Manchester City, where she made 119 appearances and scored 22 goals, since 2017, in addition to a loan spell at Everton.
She has 20 caps and three goals for England, and was part of the team that won the European Championship in 2025.
“I’m a player who wants the ball, and when I get it I like to look up and try and make things happen for my team-mates, so I think I can fit in really well here. I know the ambitions are very high and I want to help the team push towards them.”
“As the transfer window draws to a close, we are very pleased with the investments we have made in Jess, Julia, and Fridolina – all world-class players who know what it takes to compete and win at the highest level. They will further strengthen our talented young squad as we look to take the next steps forward in our development, this season and beyond.”
